item.title: 659 help making a timer
item.dc:creator: @xXxSkillerxXx xXxSkillerxXx
item.description:
@xXxSkillerxXx wrote:

case 18509: final int rand = (int) (Math.random() * (2 + 1)); skillcapeAnimation = 13190; skillcapeGraphic = 2442; player.getAppearance().transformToNpc((rand==0?11227:(rand==1?11228:11229))); player.getAppearance().asNpc = true; player.getUpdateFlags().setAppearanceUpdateRequired(true); player.animate((rand==0?13192:(rand==1?13193:13194))); if(System.currentTimeMillis() >= 4500) <rigth here!!!!!!!!!! player.getAppearance().transformToPlayer(); player.getUpdateFlags().setAppearanceUpdateRequired(true); break;
Hi i need help making thsi command work i pretty much just need a timer for this and " if(System.currentTimeMillis() >= 4500) " isnt working can someone make me a timer that will last me 5 seconds? for my skillcape emote. Thank you!

Read full topic
